TermDefinition.DefinitionText: An antiviral agent that is being studied as a treatment for AIDS-related cytomegalovirus. It is changed in the body to ganciclovir.

SpanishTermDefinition.DefinitionText: Antiv√≠rico en estudio como tratamiento del citomegalovirus relacionado con el SIDA. En el cuerpo se convierte en ganciclovir.
